english_translation: Narrated by Abdullah ibn Babi: We prayed Jumu'ah (Friday prayer) with Umar. We sighted the crescent of Shawwal. He said: I do not hear of any man who breaks his fast before the night (falls) except that I will hurt him.

english_translation: Mawla of Umm Hani' al-Hashimi, a Kufi. Muhammad ibn Bashar said to me: Ibn Mahdi abandoned the hadith of Abu Salih. Muhammad said from Hakam ibn Bashir, from Amr ibn Qais al-Milai: He said, Mujahid used to forbid the tafsir (interpretation) of Abu Salih. It is said [his name was] Badhaam. Ahmad ibn Sulaiman said to me: Ibn Uyaynah narrated to us, from Muhammad ibn Qais, from Habib ibn Abi Thabit, he said: We used to call Abu Salih by the name Badhaam. Ishaq narrated to me: Husain narrated to us, from Za'idah, from Mansur, Abu Salih mawla of Umm Hani' narrated to me, from Ibn Abbas, concerning destruction/ruin.

narrators.name: Muhammad ibn Bashar

narrators.name: Ibn Mahdi

english_translation: The brother of Tamim, who was in Syria. He heard from the Prophet ﷺ. Buday, the mawla of Abdullah ibn Ja'far ibn Abi Talib al-Hashimi, from Abdullah ibn Ja'far: Indeed the Prophet ﷺ named Medina as Tayyibah (wholesome/good). Umar ibn Abd al-Wahhab told us from Juwayriyyah, and from Isa ibn Umar ibn Musa. Umar said: From Buday, if Allah wills.
